item.title: Project-Based Video Editors Wanted for Long-Form Video Tutorials - Upwork
item.description:
𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐔𝐬:
K9 Mania Dog Trainer Academy is dedicated to educating and empowering aspiring dog trainers through expert training techniques and comprehensive video tutorials. We are looking for talented and experienced video editors to join our team on a project basis to create engaging and educational long-form video tutorials.

𝐉𝐨𝐛 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧:
We are looking for highly skilled, project-based video editors proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe After Effects to edit long-form video tutorials. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of visual storytelling, excellent organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail.

𝐒𝐤𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐬:
- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro.
- Experience with Adobe After Effects.
- Ability to conceptualize and create engaging video content based on provided inspiration and scripts.
- Skilled in developing creative ideas that convey the message effectively and engagingly.
- A keen eye for detail to ensure high-quality output.
- Ability to spot and correct errors in the video, including visual and audio elements.
- Proven experience in content creation, particularly for marketing or educational videos.
- Ability to make creative decisions independently while aligning with the overall vision.
- Ability to manage time effectively and meet project deadlines.
- Efficient workflow management to handle multiple tasks and revisions.
- Strong communication skills to understand project requirements and provide updates.
- Ability to collaborate effectively with the project team and respond to feedback.
- Flexibility to adapt to changing project requirements and feedback.
- Openness to experimenting with new ideas and techniques.

𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬:
- Edit long-form video tutorials to make them engaging and informative.
- Utilize advanced features of Adobe Premiere Pro and After
- Effects for high-quality output.
- Maintain clean and structured project files for easy collaboration.
- Develop creative ideas and storytelling techniques to enhance the video content.
- Ensure high-quality output by paying attention to detail and correcting errors.
- Manage time effectively to meet project deadlines and handle multiple tasks.
- Communicate effectively with the project team and respond to feedback.

𝐑𝐚𝐭𝐞:
- The rate for this position is negotiable.

𝐃𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐞:
- Projects need to be completed before the end of July 2024.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐲:
If you are a talented video editor passionate about creating engaging long-form video tutorials, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining your experience and why you would be a great fit for this role.

Join us at K9 Mania Dog Trainer Academy and help us create amazing video content that educates and captivates our audience!

𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐲 𝐍𝐨𝐰!

Should you be shortlisted, we will schedule further discussions via Google Meet.


Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00

Category: Video Editing

Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video

item.title: Transcription and AI Voice Reconstruction for Instructional Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled professional to transcribe, edit, and recreate an instructional video using AI voice technology. The ideal candidate should be proficient in using AI tools for voice generation and possess expertise in technical diagrams and textbook-style presentations. The main responsibilities will include transcribing the audio content of the video, editing the transcript for clarity and accuracy, and utilizing AI voice technology to reconstruct the video with the new voiceover. The final result should be a high-quality instructional video with clear audio and visually appealing diagrams. If you have a strong attention to detail, excellent editing skills, and a creative mindset, we would love to hear from you.

item.title: UGC Creator for T-SHIRT Try-On Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Description
We are looking for a UGC creator to create short 10-second videos showing blank T-Shirts and Sweatshirts in a try-on-haul style. The videos will be simple and straightforward with minimal movement, focusing on the aesthetic and fit of the clothing. There is no spoken content or editing. Each video is 10 seconds long, shot in one take, with no editing.

Requirements
- Female
- Age appearance under 40
- Have access to an iPhone 14 Pro or better, or an SLR camera
- Should be based in the USA or North America, because we will ship the clothes to you

Project Details:
- Number of Videos: 20
- Length: Each video will be 10 seconds long.
- Style: Videos will be done in a single take, with no editing, cuts or color grading
- Background: A boho clean aesthetic background with a neutral color palette
- The Clothing will be shipped to you

Additional
- Experience in recording video content.
- Ability to capture high-quality (4K) video with the specified devices.
- Attention to detail in showcasing apparel features and fit.
- Reliable and able to meet deadlines.

Deliverables:
- 20, 10-second videos in 4K MP4 format.
- Videos should feature clear and well-lit shots of the apparel in a try-on-haul style.
- Examples will be provided for clarity and understanding

Timeline:
- The project should be completed within 3 days.

Other Things To Know:
Previous experience in UGC is a bonus, but not required.

Budget: $300

Category: Video Editing

item.title: (non-US only) Long-Term Video Editor For Faceless YouTube Channel (Remote) - Upwork
item.description:
Job post description: Stable, part-time, remote video editing position

We are looking for a video editor for our YouTube channel.

You must be fast, effective, and have previous editing experience! You must also be able to add music and text and make the videos look professional.

Here are examples of the YouTube video editing style we are looking for you to create (titles below):
- Mouth breathing is killing you - Evil Food Supply
- 15 Things You Didn't Know About The Cosmetics Industry - Alux.com
- The EVIL History of Skincare - Evil Food Supply
- Beauty's Dark Secret - Forever50

If you're confident, you can edit this dynamic documentary STYLE, then apply for this ASAP.

Do not apply if you do not think you can edit at this level of style or improve the quality.

Here are our other requirements. Everything mentioned is here for a reason and is required. Do NOT apply if you don't meet all these requirements:

Things required:
-Fluent in English
-EXTREME ATTENTION TO DETAILS
-Quick at responding and meeting deadlines
-Solid sound mixing and sound design (effects,) abilities
-Ability to work with motion graphics and dynamic links in Adobe
-Be receptive to constructive feedback
-Be able to learn new things quickly
-Be able to use Google Suite: Gmail, Drive, Docs, Sheets, Calendar, etc.
-Quick turnaround times of 3-5 days and 24 hours for edits

You will need a strong computer that can edit videos and upload videos at a fast speed.

To apply, send links to 3 of the projects you are most proud of (make sure the link is viewable).

If this job interests you, apply ASAP.

If we like what we see, we'll contact you and pay you for a quick test. This will confirm if your style is the right fit for the channel.

item.title: Video Testimonial Editor Clean-Up Task - Upwork
item.description:
Task Overview
We are looking for skilled video editors to help clean up and enhance testimonial videos. The primary focus is on removing dead space, adding live captions, and ensuring the overall quality of the video is high. This description outlines the details and requirements for the task.

Candidate Requirements
Proficiency in English: Strong communication skills to ensure accurate captioning and understanding of video content.


Key Responsibilities
Edit Testimonial Videos: Cut out dead space and unnecessary pauses to create a smooth, engaging flow.
Add Live Captions: Implement accurate live captions for all spoken content, ensuring they are synchronized with the audio.
Ensure High-Quality Output: Maintain a professional standard of video quality suitable for sharing on various platforms like Instagram (Reels) and YouTube.

Detailed Requirements

Video Editing
Length: Each video will be between 30 seconds to 1 minute long.
Dead Space Removal: Identify and cut out any dead space or long pauses to keep the video concise and engaging.
Tools: Use professional video editing software capable of handling live captions and high-quality exports.

Live Captions
Accuracy: Captions must accurately reflect the spoken words and be free of grammatical errors.
Synchronization: Ensure captions appear on-screen in real time with the speaker’s dialogue.
Clarity: Use a readable font and appropriate size, ensuring captions are easily visible against the video background.


Additional Opportunities
Interested candidates should be prepared to edit more than one video, as we have over 10 videos needing attention. Excellent performance on initial tasks could lead to long-term collaboration. If the quality of work meets our standards, there will be ongoing opportunities, including:
Instagram Reels: Create short, engaging live-action videos with music overlays.
YouTube Videos: Produce longer format videos, potentially requiring voiceovers.


Hourly Range: $11.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 21:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Cleanup, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Live Action Video, Video Editing, Testimonial Video, Caption
Skills: Video Cleanup, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Live Action Video, Video Editing, Testimonial Video, Caption

item.title: Freelance YouTube Channel Localization Manager (German) - Upwork
item.description:
We are a data-driven digital-first media company specializing in creating short-form web series for social video platforms. Our mission is to create fun factual content that educates the world about science and the humanities.

We are looking for a talented and motivated individual to manage one of our French YouTube channels.  You will play a dual role: localizing content from English to German using AI tools while driving programming, community engagement, and channel growth.

Responsibilities:
- Select and prioritize episodes for localization based on audience preferences and trends.
- Translate and dubb videos from English to German using AI tools.
- Upload videos to the YouTube channel with accurate titles, thumbnails, descriptions, and tags in German.
- Ensure all videos meet YouTube’s guidelines and our quality standards.
- Monitor and moderate comments on the French channel, fostering a positive and active community environment.
- Engage with the audience through comments and community posts to build a loyal subscriber base.
- Respond to viewer feedback and questions in a timely and professional manner.
- Develop and execute strategies to grow the German YouTube channel.
- Analyze channel performance using YouTube Analytics and other tools to inform content and growth strategies.
- Collaborate with the main channel team to align on content and promotional strategies.
- Stay updated with YouTube trends and best practices in the German-speaking market.

Qualifications:
- Native German speaker with fluency in English.
- Excellent translation and localization skills. Bonus if you're familiar with science/engineering content.
- Proven experience in managing and growing YouTube channels, preferably in the German market.
- Strong understanding of YouTube algorithms, SEO, and best practices.
- Basic video editing skills using Adobe Premiere or similar software.
- Highly organized and detail-oriented.
- Creative thinker with a strategic mindset.
- Self-starter with the ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks.


Hourly Range: $8.00-$15.00

item.title: Pro Videographer to film workshop and edit compelling sizzle reels - Upwork
item.description:
I'm very excited to launch my new seminar series with a small event in Los Angeles.  I'm looking for an expert videographer to film the event, and edit the footage for a variety of assets, including a sizzle reel.  If it's possible for you to cover photography, that would be great as well (we can discuss further).  I'm keen to find someone with very good taste, and creative vision and judgement.  Also, it would be great to have a 2-camera set up for the most robust visuals, but this is not mandatory.

~Event Details~

- 15-30 senior marketing executives
- Me speaking and presenting, with some breakout activities
- Will be held in a small, elegant space, which I am locking in currently (~1200 - 2000 sq ft.)
- The event will be held in Los Angeles in early August (likely Sunday, 8/4 - confirming within the next few days)
- The event is likely to be held at this location (confirming in the next few days): https://www.thestorefront.com/spaces/united-states/california/los-angeles/32304-dtla-grand-loft-with-high-ceilings

~High-Level Creative Vision~

- My seminar, Executive Gravitas, is rooted in teaching executives how to be their most impressive selves, and my brand is very professional, impressive, and elegant.  I am not stuffy, though, so this should be vibrant and creative (not corporate).  I want the coverage and assets to be impressive and elegant, and exciting.
- The overall goals for the video assets are to 1) Showcase my brand in an impressive and beautiful way, 2) give viewers an idea of what an Executive Gravitas event is like (and intrigue them to attend one), and 3) create testimonials.

~Assets Sought (open for discussion - we may not edit these all at once, but my goal is to create these assets from the footage filmed)~

- Sizzle reel (longer form, 2+ minutes)
- Set of short clips for digital ads and other use (10-30sec)
- Short testimonials from select attendees (15-30sec)
- Separate footage of me describing the event (like an interview but no interviewer)

~Here are a few examples of videos from successful speakers.  Keep in mind, mine will only have footage taken at this event, there will not be other media pulled into mine (our project will source footage from a single event / filming instance)~

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ChHNTCf1jdw
- I really like the dynamic and energetic editing that convinces the viewer of his skill and credibility

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HEQxiykY4G8
- This is a good example of interview style footage woven into event footage

Hourly Range: $50.00-$125.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 21:14 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Event Photography, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Business, Event Photography, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Motion Graphics

We are seeking a talented and creative video creator to produce a 30-second reel that combines engaging infographics with professional AI voiceovers in both Arabic and English. Ability to meet deadlines and communicate effectively.

item.title: Videographer in Sao Paulo for filming international conference on June 19 and 20 - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a videographer who will capture an event we are hosting in Sao Paulo on June 19 and 20 (the last day doesn’t need to be captured).
Event website: https://forum.aceeu.org/americas2024

Event times:
- June 19, 9 am until around 21:00
- June 20, 9 am until around  21:00

The event will feature different sessions, such as keynotes, discussion panels, workshops and an Award Ceremony. Also, the social aspects (cocktail reception, dinner) shall be covered). Most importantly, we need to cover an Award Ceremony (e.g. finalists on stage receiving the awards).

In addition to this, we want to create short video interviews of around 2 to 3 minutes with each of the 15 finalists. These shall be recorded in front of a backdrop wall with the logos of the awards (https://flic.kr/p/2oNr5PR).

The film material shall result in:
- 1 event after video of around 2 to 3 minutes, showcasing keynotes, workshops, social activities, etc. (see example here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lnNrl9wnAO4)
- 1 video of around 45 to 60 seconds which only features the award ceremony and winners (we want to use that in future promotion to show how “cool” the Awards are).
- 15 short interview videos (see example here, but this time we want to do it in front of a logo wall: https://youtu.be/ZqHxosQrNlk)

Videos shall have background sound, captions and an intro and outro.

The event will take place at the University of Sao Paulo:

Av. Prof. Luciano Gualberto, 908 - FEA 5
Butantã, São Paulo - SP, 05508-010
Brazil

The videos need to be submitted 14 days after the event.

We are looking for a videographer with experience in covering events where it is key to capture the emotions of attendees and the expressions of speakers.


Posted On: June 14, 2024 20:05 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Event Photography, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Event Photography, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Netherlands

item.title: Video Editor For Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We have a youtube channel in the travel/world niche and are looking to hire a second video editor to increase our output.

The videos are on average 12-16 minutes, and generally list format. They consist of footage of the places we're talking about - occasionally stock footage, articles/websites that are linked in the script and images to make video more engaging.

The perfect candidate:
-Can make videos with good footage while avoiding copyright
-Good communication
-Understands what a good video looks like
-Can keep viewers engaged
-Can do map animations(not a deal breaker if you can't)

Ideally 2 day turnaround
Experience with trello is a bonus too

For reference on video quality/style watch this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OQvWRWIEmBk
Please attach past work samples!

item.title: Short Reel Creator for Skincare Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are a skincare brand looking for a talented and creative individual to help us create short reels for our social media platforms. The reels will showcase our products, highlight their benefits, and engage our target audience. As a Short Reel Creator, your responsibilities will include storyboard creation, video editing, adding animations and effects, selecting appropriate music, and ensuring the final product is visually appealing and on-brand.

5-6 reels only

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro)
    - Knowledge of motion graphics and animation
    - Strong storytelling and visual communication skills
    - Ability to work with branding guidelines and create visually consistent content
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

    This is a medium-sized project expected to last for 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level expert who has experience creating engaging and captivating short reels for brands. If you are passionate about skincare and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 14, 2024 19:29 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Commercial, Trailer
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Commercial, Trailer
